# Pull Request

## Description
Brief description of the changes in this PR.

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Exchange support addition
- [ ] Test improvements
- [ ] Code refactoring

## Related Issues
Fixes #(issue number)
Relates to #(issue number)

## Changes Made
- [ ] Added/modified functionality
- [ ] Updated tests
- [ ] Updated documentation
- [ ] Updated configuration files

## Testing
- [ ] All existing tests pass
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality
- [ ] Manual testing completed
- [ ] Tested with sample data

### Test Results
```
# Paste test results here
python run_tests.py --quick
```

## Exchange Support (if applicable)
- [ ] Added exchange configuration to `config/exchanges.yaml`
- [ ] Added sample data file to `data/examples/`
- [ ] Added tests for new exchange format
- [ ] Updated documentation with new exchange
- [ ] Tested with real export data (anonymized)

## Documentation
- [ ] Updated README.md if needed
- [ ] Updated relevant documentation in `docs/`
- [ ] Added docstrings for new functions
- [ ] Updated CHANGELOG.md

## Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Code is properly commented
- [ ] No hardcoded values or credentials
- [ ] Error handling is appropriate
- [ ] Logging is appropriate

## Security & Privacy
- [ ] No sensitive data in code or tests
- [ ] Input validation is proper
- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] Privacy considerations addressed

## Checklist
- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

Add screenshots to help explain your changes.

## Additional Notes
Any additional information or context about the PR.
